verbs.description: [ARGM-MNR: romantic way] to [V: pick] [ARG1: someone] up [ARGM-LOC: at the airport] a two - day trip feels like forever when your loved one goes away without you and if she been gone two months then your reunion at the airport will really be electric whether she just crossed state lines or is returning from the other side of the world greeting your partner at the airport with more than just a don
